comments.body: This used to be a const constructor.  Is it intentional that it's not anymore?  (the change broke some clients inside Google because they were calling `const ButtonTheme(...)`)

Looks like it's the construction of `data` that necessitated this.  The same thing happened in `ButtonTheme.bar`.  @Hixie I'm thinking it's not worth sending out a breaking change notification since the fix is so obvious.  You agree?

FYI, I updated the changelog to call out these changes.

https://github.com/flutter/flutter/wiki/Changelog#api-changes-to-buttontheme
I've sent out a breaking change notification.
